city.name: Kassanda
city.description: Kassanda is a subcounty in Uganda. It has 9 parishes and 129 villages. Kassanda is in Mubende district. This is about 110 kilometres (68 mi) west of Kampala, the capital and largest city in Uganda

phrases.englishPhrase: Godliness with contentment is great gain
phrases.foreignLanguage: Frömmigkeit mit Zufriedenheit ist ein großer Gewinn

phrases.englishPhrase: For be of good joy, I have overcome the World.
phrases.foreignLanguage: Denn sei froh, ich habe die Welt überwunden.

phrases.englishPhrase: I am the truth, way, and life.
phrases.foreignLanguage: Ich bin die Wahrheit, der Weg und das Leben.

favouriteSubjects.name: Computer Science
favouriteSubjects.description: The study of computers and computing, including their theoretical and algorithmic foundations, hardware and software, and their uses for processing information.

favouriteSubjects.name: Informatics
favouriteSubjects.description: formatics is the study of computational systems.

favouriteSubjects.name: Statistics
favouriteSubjects.description: Statistics is a branch of applied mathematics that involves the collection, description, analysis, and inference of conclusions from quantitative data
